meta.name: Message Length
meta.brief: Specifies the message length. If set to 0, the message is not set.

meta.name: Total Contact Count
meta.brief: Specifies the number of contacts stored in all contact banks.

meta.name: Contact Bitmap
meta.brief: Bitmap enabling each of the 800 contacts.

meta.name: Definition Index
meta.brief: The n-th entry corresponds to the n-th contact, irrespective of the DMR id.

meta.name: Sorted Index
meta.brief: Same index but sorted by DMR Id.

meta.name: Contact Index
meta.brief: Specifies the contact index +1. If 0, disabled.

meta.name: Hang Time Duration
meta.brief: Specifies the hang time in multiples of 0.5s.

meta.name: Secondary Priority Channel Index
meta.brief: Specifies the index+1 of the secondary priority channel. The index refers to the index of the channel within the scan list. Disabled if set to 0.

meta.name: Primary Priority Channel Index
meta.brief: Specifies the index+1 of the primary priority channel. The index refers to the index of the channel within the scan list. Disabled if set to 0.

meta.name: Channel Index
meta.brief: Specifies the Channel index+1. If 0=Current channel.

meta.name: RX Frequency
meta.description: The frequency is specified in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: TX Frequency
meta.description: The frequency is specified in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Prevent Talkaround
meta.brief: Prevents enabling talkaround on that channel via radio menu.

item.name: CTCSS/DCS match or Color Code match + idle

meta.name: Enable DMR APRS RX
meta.brief: Enables reception of DMR APRS messages.

meta.name: Emergency System Index
meta.brief: Specifies the EM system index+1. If set to 0, disabled.

meta.name: Squelch Level
meta.brief: Specifies the FM and DMR squelch level.

meta.name: APRS Mode
meta.brief: Enables DMR APRS reports for the channel.

meta.name: Group List Index
meta.brief: Specifies the group list index +1. If set to 0, no group list is selected.

meta.name: RX Tone
meta.description: The most significant bits specify the type. This is either 00b=CTCSS, 01b=DCS, 10b=DCS inverted. The remaining 3 BCD digits encode either the frequency in multiples of 0.1Hz or the octal DCS code. If ffffh, disabled.

meta.name: TX Tone
meta.description: The most significant bits specify the type. This is either 00b=CTCSS, 01b=DCS, 10b=DCS inverted. The remaining 3 BCD digits encode either the frequency in multiples of 0.1Hz or the octal DCS code. If ffffh, disabled.

meta.name: Enable Show PTT Id
meta.description: I don't know, if this shows the own ID or received IDs.

meta.name: Squelch Mode
meta.brief: Specifies, what controls the squlech. Either tone/squelch or optional signaling.

meta.name: PTT Id
meta.brief: Specifies, when the (analog) PTT ID is send.

meta.name: RX Frequency
meta.description: The frequency is specified in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: TX Frequency
meta.description: The frequency is specified in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Prevent Talkaround
meta.brief: Prevents enabling talkaround on that channel via radio menu.

item.name: CTCSS/DCS match or Color Code match + idle

meta.name: Enable DMR APRS RX
meta.brief: Enables reception of DMR APRS messages.

meta.name: Emergency System Index
meta.brief: Specifies the EM system index+1. If set to 0, disabled.

meta.name: Squelch Level
meta.brief: Specifies the FM and DMR squelch level.

meta.name: APRS Mode
meta.brief: Enables DMR APRS reports for the channel.

meta.name: Group List Index
meta.brief: Specifies the group list index +1. If set to 0, no group list is selected.

meta.name: RX Tone
meta.description: The most significant bits specify the type. This is either 00b=CTCSS, 01b=DCS, 10b=DCS inverted. The remaining 3 BCD digits encode either the frequency in multiples of 0.1Hz or the octal DCS code. If ffffh, disabled.

meta.name: TX Tone
meta.description: The most significant bits specify the type. This is either 00b=CTCSS, 01b=DCS, 10b=DCS inverted. The remaining 3 BCD digits encode either the frequency in multiples of 0.1Hz or the octal DCS code. If ffffh, disabled.

meta.name: Enable Show PTT Id
meta.description: I don't know, if this shows the own ID or received IDs.

meta.name: Squelch Mode
meta.brief: Specifies, what controls the squlech. Either tone/squelch or optional signaling.

meta.name: PTT Id
meta.brief: Specifies, when the (analog) PTT ID is send.

meta.name: Contact Banks
meta.brief: There are only 800 contacts. Hence, the last contact bank remains half empty.

meta.name: Call Type
meta.brief: If all call is selected, the ID is also set to ffffffh.

meta.name: Current Channel Index VFO A
meta.brief: Specifies the index+1 within the selected zone.

meta.name: Current Channel Index VFO B
meta.brief: Specifies the channel index+1 within the current zone.
